job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Team OMGltbrgtltbrgtOrderMyGear is the industry leader in technology for the team gear and promotional product space OMG continues to push boundaries shaping the future of group online commerce We approach challenges as opportunities and we are continuing to build a Team of OMGers who work hard welcome change and live out our MagicltbrgtltbrgtCome join us at OMG You can play a pivotal role in this rapidly changing industry as we scale our platform and improve the eCommerce experience for our clients and their customersltbrgtltbrgtOur MagicltbrgtltbrgtTEAM IS EVERYTHINGltbrgtltbrgtWe Invest in Each OtherltbrgtltbrgtWe Create SolutionsltbrgtltbrgtWe Enjoy the RideltbrgtltbrgtEMBRACE IT OWN IT ALL INltbrgtltbrgtEngineering  OMGltbrgtltbrgtAs a Software Engineer you will be part of a growing development Team and directly impact the development process and our culture We are building our platform with tools like Docker Kubernetes Go PHP Node React and other exciting technologies  we believe in picking the right tool for the jobltbrgtltbrgtDay in the LifeltbrgtltulgtltligtYou will work closely with a Team to understand feature requests help plan development work and implement software solutionsltligtltligtYou will implement fixes to existing software defectsltligtltligtYou will be proactive in solving problems and comfortable in moving quicklyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWhat You NeedltbrgtltulgtltligtDegree in Computer Science or equivalentltligtltligt3 to 5 years of experience building web apps We will be most interested in checking out what you have builtltligtltligtExperience with the abovelisted technologies is a plus but most important to us is the ability to pick up new tools and languages quickly and the proven desire to do soltligtltligtSomebody who asks a lot of questions is confident not knowing everything and is more likely to ask for help and collaborate than go at it aloneltligtltligtTrack record of solving problems and owning your visionltligtltligtYou need to be crisp and detailoriented and willing to own an outcome and run with it without somebody telling you exactly how to get thereltligtltligtA scrappy get stuff done attitude that completes highquality projects quicklyltligtltligtExperience in eCommerce is a plusltligtltligtUS Citizen or Permanent Resident status requiredltligtltligtVisa Sponsorship not availableltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtOrderMyGear provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race color religion age sex sexual orientation national origin disability status genetics protected veteran status sexual orientation gender identity or expression or any other characteristic protected by federal state or local lawsltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtThis policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment including recruiting hiring placement promotion termination layoff recall transfer leaves of absence compensation and trainingltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtSome of the Perks ltulgtltligtCompetitive benefits ampamp PTOltligtltligt401k with employer matchltligtltligtPaid parental leaveltligtltligtWholesale discount to name brandsltligtltligtInoffice benefitsltligtltulgtltligtCatered lunches ampamp breakfastsltligtltligtCompany happy hours and outingsltligtltligtCasual office atmosphere ampamp one block from Deep EllumltligtltligtFully stocked kitchenltligtltligtCommuter benefitsltligtltulgtltulgt
